title: The Dangers Of Falling For Diet And Fitness Click Bait
description:
The misleading headlines that make up click bait. Plus, Jillian and Cindy try to take the stigma out of PMS, and The Love Doctor helps a caller through her first tough break-up.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
